PHRASE.LANG: Calcifur was raised by a formidable Sorcerer from a pup, and was trained to guard his precious potions. He also loves having his belly rubbed! [#Legal]
Calcifur a été élevé par un formidable Sorcier, et a été entrainé à garder ses précieuses potions. Il aime qu'on lui gratte le ventre! [#Legal]
Calcifur wurde von einem mächtigen Magier großgezogen und wurde darauf abgerichtet, kostbare Zaubertränke zu bewachen. Er lässt sich auch gerne den Bauch kraulen! [#Legal]
Calcifur è stato cresciuto da un temibile stregone sin da quando era cucciolo ed è stato addestrato per fare la guardia alle sue preziose pozioni. Adora anche le carezze sulla pancia! [#Legal]
Calcifur fue criado desde cachorro por un mago formidable que le entrenó para guardar sus valiosas pociones. ¡También le gusta que le rasquen la barriga! [#Legal]
칼시퍼는 새끼 때부터 강력한 마법사가 키워서 자신이 갖고 있는 소중한 포션을 지키도록 훈련받았습니다. 그 녀석은 자기 배를 긁어주는 것도 좋아해요! [#Legal]
Calcifur was raised by a formidable Sorcerer from a pup, and was trained to guard his precious potions. He also loves having his belly rubbed! [#Legal]
卡西佛從小就跟著法力無邊的魔法師，並在接受訓練後負責保護法師的珍貴藥水。牠也喜歡肚子被人摸。 [#Legal]
卡西佛從小就跟著法力無邊的魔法師，並在接受訓練後負責保護法師的珍貴藥水。牠也喜歡肚子被人摸。 [#Legal]
Calcifur was raised by a formidable Sorcerer from a pup, and was trained to guard his precious potions. He also loves having his belly rubbed! [#Legal]
